value:
$nMPID_リン|I'm glad that Mark is with me. I may
not have been able to keep calm in
this unknown place otherwise...

$nMPID_リン|The Lorca chieftain is my father. It's
only natural that I learn how to ride
and fight alongside everyone else!

$nMPID_リン|I won't leave Mark alone. If we're
going, it'll be together!

$nMPID_リン|You know, Summoner, you kind of
remind me of Mark... I can't really put
my finger on why. Just a feeling!

$nMPID_リン|Seeing all of these Heroes makes me
wonder about what incredible things
may happen in their worlds!

$nMPID_リン|Best regards from your friend!
I'm happy that you and
$Nf get along.

$nMPID_リン|Amazing, Mark! We go together so
well—like the wind and the plains!

$nMPID_リン|I've got your back, Mark! You just
focus on the fight!

$nMPID_リン|Don't worry, my gut is telling me
that something better will happen
next time!

$nMPID_リン|This is great! Let's have a big group
hug as thanks! Come on, Mark, get in
here!

I'm Lyn, and this is Mark, an aspiring
tactician! I bet you two can learn a lot
from each other, so listen up!

$nMPID_リン|Here's one of Sacae's laws: you must
offer a prayer to the land and stars
each and every day, without fail.$k$pSacae has so many tribes, even the
scariest invaders would turn tail and
run if they all rallied together!$k$pI'd raise my sword and fight
alongside the Lorca to protect the
plains of Sacae!$k$pOh, I know. Why don't we make a
vow, Mark? Let's swear as friends
to help each other in tough times.$k$pIt'll be a formal promise between
Lyn and Mark. Oh, why don't you
join in too, Summoner?$k$pEven if we grow up and forget our
vow, the promise itself will stand for
all time. Always!
$nMPID_リン|We won't lose!
$nMPID_リン|We can win together!
$nMPID_リン|Me too!
$nMPID_リン|The feeling of the wind!
It can't be...
Stay strong!
I've got your back!
Lend us strength!
Let's keep it together!
Let's hold hands so we don't get separated. OK?
Hmm...
Swift as the wind!
All right, let's go!

$nMPID_リン|Whew... I'm exhausted. Let's take
a break.

Being whisked away to a new world
was a big surprise, but I think I'm
finally getting used to it.

How about you, Mark? ...Oh, so you
feel the same?

I'm really glad to have met you here.
It probably would have been a lot
harder alone.

Say, Mark. You said that you wanted
to study tactics, didn't you?

My father and the other Lorca
chieftains are teaching me
how to ride a horse and fight.

If something bad happens, I want to
be able to fight with them!

Don't give me such a worried look!
This is just natural for someone from
the plains of Sacae.
Besides, my mother is so gentle...

So I want to protect her! I won't let
anyone lay a finger on her!

Hey, why are you laughing? I'm pretty
strong, you know.

Someday I'll be like my father, a
warrior galloping gracefully on
horseback!

When that time comes, I'll protect
you too, Mark.

If you become a tactician, you'll need
to go into battle too. That could be
dangerous.

My father always says that it's the
duty of Sacaen warriors to defend
the tribe with our lives.

You may not be part of the tribe, but
you are my friend.

So I promise I will be there for you.
Even after we grow up. Don't forget
that you can always call on me.
